meanings.definition: A type of cell found in connective tissue that produces mucin.
meanings.sent1: Myxocytes are important cells that help make the slimy substance in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: The myxocytes in the tissue play a crucial role in producing mucin.
meanings.sent3: The myxocytes decided to have a mucin-making competition just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The myxocytes worked tirelessly, like little mucin factories in the body.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the myxocytes looked like tiny factories producing mucin.
